creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Nancy Tilden Jackman
description: young man reclining on olive green cushion resting PR arm on low stool; man holds closed fan between two hands, looking directly at viewer; image at UR of man and woman walking with woman carrying child on back
marks: Signature and Date LLC, in red paint: [Leo A Makielski/ 1908]
title: Portrait of Japanese Man
